sentences.sContent: I cannot tell whether she is old or young, for I have never seen her.
sentences.sCn: 我不知道她是年老还是年轻，因为我从没见过她。

sentences.sContent: He found it increasingly difficult to read, for his eyesight was beginning to fail.
sentences.sCn: 他觉得阅读越来越费劲，因为他的视力开始衰退了。

synos.tran: 为，为了；因为；给；对于；至于；适合于

phrases.pCn: 打算；在选举中被提名；在法庭受审；被关押
举个例说；作为其中一个
去找；被认为；主张；拥护；努力获取

trans.tranOther: used to introduce the reason for something
used to say who is intended to get or use something, or where something is intended to be used
